function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Failure of existing health systems to prevent massive disruption caused by COVID-19","Impact":"Negative impact on global economy and public health crisis","Mitigation":"Developing newer methods to control the spread of pandemics","Technologies":"Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Deep Learning","People":"Global population, public health organizations","Owner":"Healthcare researchers, governments, AI and technology companies"},{"Description":"Inadequate processing and integration of clinical, epidemiological, and genetic data","Impact":"Ineffective prevention, diagnosis, and management of disease","Mitigation":"Implementing a precise and integrated command and control system, utilizing machine learning","Technologies":"Machine Learning, Command and Control Systems","People":"Healthcare researchers, public health organizations","Owner":"Healthcare researchers, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Inability to optimize health care research in ongoing pandemics","Impact":"Inefficient utilization of time and resources, suboptimal public health measures","Mitigation":"Utilizing neural networks and AI to optimize health care research","Technologies":"Artificial Intelligence, Neural Networks","People":"Healthcare researchers, public health organizations","Owner":"Healthcare researchers, public health organizations"}]}
